table.name: or_equipment
table.description: Defines equipments associated with an order release that the user has supplied.

columns.name: ORDER_RELEASE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order release.

columns.name: OR_EQUIPMENT_SEQ
columns.description: The equipment sequence to allow for multiple equipment request to be specified on the order release.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The seal sequence to allow for multiple seals to be defined.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The equipment seal number for the order release ordered equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: The equipment number as an identifier specified for this order release equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL
columns.description: The equipment initial as an identifier specified for this order release equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_INITIAL_NUMBER
columns.description: The equipment initial and number as an identifier specified for this order release equipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The actual equipment GID if the equipment is managed in the database.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
